sentences: Clifton Elliot Anderson (born October 5, 1957) is an American jazz trombonist.
Anderson was born in New York City on October 5, 1957.
Anderson attended the High School of Music and Art in New York, and graduated from the Manhattan School of Music in 1978.
Anderson's debut album as a leader was Landmarks, which was recorded in 1995 for Milestone Records.
A further album, Decade, was released by Doxy around 2008.
